txt.en: The pond that contains the water-lilies is just to the west of the Mead Hall.\n\nSelethryth asked you to gather water-lilies to feed her goat.
Selethryth is north-west of the Mead Hall of Fenmarch.\n\nYou have gathered a number of water-lilies and should bring them back to Selethryth so that she may feed her hungry goat.

'After being frightened by those enormous frogs, I am afraid to collect the water-lilies now!

'Would you mind doing it for me? It would be a great help to me.

'Go to the pond to the west of here and gather some water-lilies for my dear Lily.'
Selethryth's goat, Lily, will only eat water-lilies, and Selethryth has no more.
'Thank you for gathering these for me. Lily will be quite happy now.\n\n'I hope those frogs left you alone. Such vile creatures!'
